Summary: Bright light moving over Englewood Florida
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Englewood
There were no other sightings in Englewood on or around November 22nd 2008
divs: sighting detailsi woke up,and took my dog for a walk at 5:15.about three to five mins into walk i turned north west and seen a very bright light to the nw.i stood there not believing what i was seeing for about 20-30 seconds,i then ran into the house to try and find a camera,my camera\video recorder broke last month.after 15-20 seconds not finding one i ran back out the front door.as i walked out the light was right over my house,and no plane could ever cover that many miles that quick.i stood there looking at it another 20 seconds when the light went out,and i ran in the house.no plane or space station has lights that bright,it was orange like light that was so bright.other people should have seen it,still dont know if im alone in seeing it.this is the first time i have ever seen anything i cant explain.
